From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-01 12:47
Subject: The Voice of the Business (VOB) initiative is back, Plastic Free July, Maison Margiela Exclusive Sale, Transform Tuesdays, Tryano's End of Season Sale
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

The Voice of the Business (VoB) initiative is back

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1411&user=10620> 	

The Voice of the Business (VoB) initiative is back again this year , designed with the aim to LISTEN to your voice, your feedback on our Group’s Support Services and ACT upon it. 

If you haven’t completed the survey yet we decided to extend the deadline to July 15th. Please make sure you are familiar with the Group’s services prior to taking this survey here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1411&user=10620> .  

If you have any inquiries, please reach out to voiceofthebusiness@chalhoub.com 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	

Plastic Free July

chunks.text:
If you haven’t completed the survey yet we decided to extend the deadline to July 15th. Please make sure you are familiar with the Group’s services prior to taking this survey here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1411&user=10620> .  

If you have any inquiries, please reach out to voiceofthebusiness@chalhoub.com 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	

Plastic Free July

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1412&user=10620> 	

Week 1 Challenge – Reusable Bottles

Snap a fun or artistic photo, GIF, or video featuring your reusable bottle and post it here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1412&user=10620> .
Bonus points if you tag a colleague and challenge them to join in!
Let’s reduce single-use plastics and show off our creativity.

The most creative entry wins a prize!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Maison Margiela Exclusive Sale 


Starting today, enjoy special access on selected lines at Maison Margiela Dubai Mall and Mall of the Emirates. 


Offer exclusively for Chalhoub Group team members just by presenting your Chalhoub ID or One Chalhoub profile, from July 1st - August 31st 

Book your appointment: Dubai Mall <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1413&user=10620> / Mall of the Emirates <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1414&user=10620>

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-3-min.png> 	

Transform Tuesdays

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1415&user=10620> 	

Omnichannel is evolving, uniting digital and physical retail into one seamless experience.
With real-time inventory, smarter fulfillment, and consistent processes across channels, we’re making shopping faster, easier, and more accurate.

What does seamless Omnichannel mean to you?
Join the conversation here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1415&user=10620> .

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-1-min.png> 	

Tryano’s End of Season Sale is now LIVE!


It's the ultimate summer sale with up to 70% off designer brands! 
Discover all you need from women's must-haves to men's essentials and kids' new closets.

Shop now at Tryano store, Abu Dhabi.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/92f3c0b6e02f8b85eaaa2e8bba2044ff2027951854.gif>
